attributes.action: Abolish The English Votes for English Laws
attributes.additional_details: The people of Scotland didn't vote for this, neither did Wales or Ireland and it is in effect the first part of separating themselves as an elite from the rest of the UK, of which English MP's are able to vote on Issues Affecting Wales, Ireland and Scotland but not vice versa.
attributes.background:
English votes for English Laws is totally unacceptable to all parties bar the Conservatives it seems.
The labour party branded it an 'incomprehensible mess'.
The SNP Condemned it.

...and so did mostly every other party.
